definition: all kinds of/all sorts of/every (different) kind of

sentences.english: We must guard against and redress all forms of covert protectionist activities.
sentences.chinese: 要警惕和糾正形形色色的隱性保護主義行爲。

sentences.english: In front of the hall is a grand urn made of variegated dark jade.
sentences.chinese: 前面的大廳是一個大金塔了形形色色黑玉。

sentences.english: The rainbow of ocean creatures fills the divers with a sense of wonder.
sentences.chinese: 彩虹般形形色色的海洋生物讓潛水夫驚奇不已。

sentences.english: Too often, it includes a long and detailed list of diverse people.
sentences.chinese: 它總是一份長長的詳細清單，包括形形色色的人。

sentences.english: The program deals with subjects as diverse as pop music and Beijing Opera.
sentences.chinese: 節目涉及從流行音樂到京劇這樣形形色色的題材。

sentences.english: Berlin becamethe decadent capital, where all sorts of sexual deprivations were practised.
sentences.chinese: 柏林成爲頹廢之都，形形色色的性變態行爲都在發生。

sentences.english: All manner of squirrely problems can be solved by evolving equations.
sentences.chinese: 通過演化方程能解決形形色色的古怪問題。

sentences.english: But young people can usually choose from a great variety of people.
sentences.chinese: 但年輕人通常能夠在形形色色的人中有所選擇。

sentences.english: The weak-willed tend to yield to various attractions and threats.
sentences.chinese: 意志薄弱的人會屈從於形形色色的誘惑和威脅。

sentences.english: Main cast has few weak links and traverses all shades of character.
sentences.chinese: 主要演員包括形形色色的性格並且很少有薄弱的環節。

sentences.english: Kopko says a range of students are signing up.
sentences.chinese: 據柯普科說，形形色色的學生都在網站註冊。

sentences.english: Everybody you come across seems to be a chief or president of some variety.
sentences.chinese: 你遇到的每個人都是形形色色的公司總裁或主席。

sentences.english: All kinds of biennales can be a big attraction in contemporary art circle this year.
sentences.chinese: 形形色色的雙年展是今年當代藝術界的一大景觀。

sentences.english: There are many different types of people and many different feelings and atmospheres within that neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 在那個街區有許多形形色色的人和不同的思想氛圍。

sentences.english: We should be wary of and correct all kinds of covered-up protectionist behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 要警惕和糾正形形色色的隱性保護主義行爲。

sentences.english: We encounter problems like these in various guises every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天我們都會遇到類似的形形色色的問題。

definition: lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
lit. fish and dragons mixed in together (idiom); fig. crooks mixed in with the honest folk
glittering jewels to delight the eye (idiom)/fig. a dazzling lineup
